name: @invertase/react-native-apple-authentication
author: Invertase <oss@invertase.io> (http://invertase.io)
description: A complete Apple Authentication services API for React Native iOS apps.

scripts.build:all: yarn build:clean && yarn build && yarn example:build:android && yarn example:build:ios
scripts.example:prepare: cd example && yarn && cd ios && (pod install || true)
scripts.example:build:android: cd example && yarn build:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.example:build:ios: cd example && yarn build:ios && (xcodebuild -workspace ios/testing.xcworkspace -scheme testing -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES || true)
